snippet: The wife, mother and cousin of the lead defendant, Mark Mazer, were to enter pleas in a case involving more than $40 million in kickbacks.
abstract: Defendants Svetlana Mazer, Larisa Medzon and Anna Makovetskaya are expected to plead guilty for their involvement in fraud scheme involving CityTime, New York City's troubled automated payroll project; three are related to Mark Mazer, lead defendant in case, who has been accused of helping to orchestrate scheme.
lead_paragraph: The wife, mother and cousin of the lead defendant, Mark Mazer, were to enter pleas in a case involving more than $40 million in kickbacks.

headline.main: Three Expected to Plead Guilty in Scheme Involving City’s Payroll Project
headline.print_headline: Three Expected to Plead Guilty in Scheme Involving City’s Payroll Project
